description: Conversion of a garage into office space, including associated external alteration involving the insertion of a window and door in lieu of the garage door opening, two roof lights and alteration to side elevations.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: OS Plan B&W, 301-EXT-01 Rev A Existing Floor Plans, 301-EXT-02 Rev A Existing Elevations & Section, 301-PROP-03 Rev A Proposed Floor Plans, 301-PROP-04 Proposed Elevations & Section, Cover Letter prepared by MZA Planning dated 15 March 2021.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012). | The detached rear outbuilding shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the development hereby approved, and shall not be used for habitable accommodation, as an independent dwelling or any industrial, commercial or business use.

REASON: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | No kitchen facilities shall be installed in the outbuilding at any time.

REASON: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

REASON: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
